{{codepointer|Classic attack}}'''A_VileTarget''' [(string ''type'')] {{doomwiki|A_VileTarget}}
Spawns the [[Classes:ArchvileFire|Arch Vile's fire]] in front of the target, and sets the spawned actor as the current actor's tracer. (See [[A_VileAttack]])
If ''type'' is specified, this will spawn an actor of that type instead of ArchvileFire.
== Examples == This example is taken from Doom's [[Classes:Archvile|Archvile]].
Missile: VILE G 0 BRIGHT [[A_VileStart]] VILE G 10 BRIGHT [[A_FaceTarget]] VILE H 8 BRIGHT [[A_VileTarget]] VILE IJKLMN 8 BRIGHT [[A_FaceTarget]] VILE O 8 BRIGHT [[A_VileAttack]] VILE P 20 BRIGHT Goto See
